effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 594,225 damage to your primary target and 101,632 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 410 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 107,893 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 161,847.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 1.1 million Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)
